item.description: The Big E is so much better on a weeknight when you can actually walk around and enjoy things without feeling rushed by the crowds. For those who are coming from the south, plan to meet at Gloria?s at 5:17 PM for carpooling. If you are going to meet us at the Big E, be sure to RSVP to Don, so you can exchange cell phone numbers to connect.
item.name: Evening Trip to Big E
